answers.answer: You need to see an EyeMD for an exam.  You did not mention any medical conditions such as diabetes, hypertension, or elevated cholesterol or which way the eye crosses-in or out, up or down.Dr. O.

question: I am 53 years old. My problem is several times a month my right eye tries to cross. If I close this eye and look out of the left eye I see fine. This only last about a minute. I have a very dull headache above the right eye. Any answers
title: Sudden eye crossing
